alert.note: Alert for Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 10 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WESTERN SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Babylon, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Islip, Brentwood, Commack, Deer Park, Lindenhurst, Hauppauge, Babylon, Robert Moses State Park, Dix Hills, Bay Shore, Sayville, Captree State Park, Central Islip, West Islip, and Copiague. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
